data.text: HELP: You are on Almere City live scores page in Football/Netherlands section. Flashscore.com offers Almere City livescore, final and partial results, standings, home stadium with official capacity, squad updates (signed and sold players, transfer fees, loan deals, free agents and complete squad list), team coach and match details (goal scorers, red cards, odds comparison, …). Besides Almere City scores you can follow 1000+ football competitions from 90+ countries around the world on Flashscore.com. Just click on the country name in the left menu and select your competition (league results, national cup livescore, other competition). Almere City scores service is real-time, updating live.
